refnamediv.refpurpose: Converts a grayscale image into indice image also provides the colormap

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis:
a = imread(img1); // the image should be gray scale
n = 16; // could be any integer
[out,map] = gray2ind(a,n);
out = output image
map = color map nx3 array

listitem.para: indice factor(int), it converts the image to having n indices

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function takes in a grayscale image and converts it into an indiced image, n is an integer specified to give the size of colormap. It has two outputs, one is the converted image and other is the colormap.
